channel.title: NSE:HUVR on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NSE:HUVR on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Unilever India’s New CEO Has to Invigorate a Sluggish Consumer Giant
item.description: Hindustan Unilever Ltd.’s new Chief Executive Officer Priya Nair is inheriting India’s largest consumer goods maker that has seen stuttering growth in the last few years.
